name: Ocarina of Time: Spaceworld '97 Experience
summary: Ocarina of Time: Spaceworld '97 Experience is a ROM hack which is a recreation of the Spaceworld '97 demonstration version of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. The creators used as source material information recorded footage and pictures of the event, information found in the Gigaleak and hidden assets found on a F-Zero X overdump cartridge.
